name: Softshrink

inputs.name: lambd
inputs.description: The threshold value lambda for the soft shrinkage operation.

output.description: The output tensor after applying the soft shrinkage operation. Values within the range [-lambd, lambd] are set to zero, while other values are shrunk by lambd.

assertions: Input Lamba value must be positive
(Of function) Output should follow input's shape, as mentioned

references.title: Soft Thresholding in Signal Processing
references.description: Wikipedia article on the soft thresholding technique

references.title: PyTorch Documentation for SoftShrink
references.description: Official PyTorch documentation for the SoftShrink function.
